features: Lightweight recycled polyester/spandex blend provides excellent stretch for complete mobility; durable recycled nylon/recycled spandex paneling provides extra protection from rock and abrasion
PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals) fends off moisture and keeps you dry
Articulated pattern allows ultimate mobility for long approaches and all-day comfort under a harness
Contoured, low-profile waistband with separating zip fly and integrated adjustable belt ensures precise fit and stays comfortable under a harness or backpack waistbelt

Secure front pockets and right-rear pocket have breathable mesh pocket bags and lie-flat construction for comfort under a harness; right-thigh security zip pocket sits comfortably above the knee and below harness leg loops
Scuff panels protect inner legs from abrasion and wear and tear; cuffs adjust with a low-profile shock cord and cord lock

Body: 4.7-oz 86% recycled polyester/14% spandex dobby. Panels: 4.5-oz 85% recycled nylon/15% recycled spandex. Both with four-way stretch and a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals)
